INSERT INTO TSJX_INFOMATION ( ID, CATAGORY_BIG_ID, CATAGORY_BIG_NAME, CATAGORY_MID_ID, CATAGORY_MID_NAME, CATAGORY_ID, CATAGORY_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, MODEL_ID, MODEL_NAME, IS_NEW, SELL_TYPE, EQUIPMENT_CONDITION, PROCEDURES, SRC, YEAR, TIME, PRICE, SERIAL_NUM, IN_STOCK_CODE, REMARK, EQUIPMENT_LOCATION, CREATE_TIME, VALID_TIME, STOCK_COUNT, SELL_COUNT, USER_ID, STATUS, WEIGHT ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryBigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryBigName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catagoryMidId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryMidName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procedures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=unkown}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inStockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_TSJX_INFOMATION.nextval as id FROM dual
